jobInfo.Jobdescription:
InfoDrive Solutions, Malaysia is seeking a talented Joomla Developer for an immediate engagement in Putrajaya.

 

Key Responsibilities:

 

As a Joomla Developer, you will be responsible for the following tasks:

 

  • Upgrade Joomla Websites: Upgrade existing Joomla websites to the latest Joomla version, ensuring that plugins, modules, and themes are also up-to-date.

 

  • Migration Support: Support the migration of Joomla websites from older versions to the latest Joomla version while ensuring compatibility and functionality.

 

  • Customization: Customize the appearance and user experience of Joomla websites using themes, modules, and custom CSS.

 

  • Extension Development: Develop extensions for Joomla websites using PHP, SQL, PostgreSQL, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to enhance their functionality.

 

  • Security Enhancement: Implement security measures for Joomla websites by configuring security settings, installing security plugins, and maintaining the latest Joomla updates.

 

  • Troubleshooting: Identify and resolve Joomla related issues, including error diagnosis, performance optimization, and addressing security vulnerabilities.

 

Qualifications:

 

  • To be considered for this role, you should possess the following skills and qualifications:

 

  • Experience: A minimum of 4-5 years of hands on experience in Joomla development.

 

  • Technical Proficiency: Proficient in PHP, SQL, PostgreSQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and other related technologies.

 

  • Joomla Expertise: Familiarity with Joomla extensions, frameworks, and related development tools.

 

  • Web Standards and SEO: Knowledge of web standards, accessibility, and SEO best practices.

 

  • Problem Solving: Strong problem solving and analytical skills to tackle complex development challenges.

 

  • Communication: Excellent communication and collaboration abilities, both within the team and with clients.

 

  • Attention to Detail: A keen attention to detail and a commitment to quality assurance.

 

If you are a Joomla enthusiast with a passion for web development and a drive for excellence, we encourage you to apply. Join us at InfoDrive Solutions and contribute to cutting-edge Joomla projects in a dynamic environment.
jobInfo.Qualification: Bachelor Degree or any relevant degree
